name: sundowning

changes in a dementia patient's behaviour around the time that the sun goes down in the evening: Management of sundowning behaviour includes restriction of daytime sleep and exposure to bright lights. Here are some ways to ease sundowners syndrome.
More examplesFewer examplesMelatonin treatment improved sleep quality and suppressed sundowning.Sundowning agitation is a common cause of institutionalization of geriatric patients with dementia. The nurse is caring for an elderly client who has been diagnosed as having sundown syndrome.
